Literature.Title: Characterization and antimicrobial evaluation of SpPR-AMP1, a proline-rich antimicrobial peptide from the mud crab Scylla paramamosain.
Literature.Author: Imjongjirak C, Amphaiphan P, Charoensapsri W, Amparyup P
